Class StupidComputerOthelloPlayer

java.lang.Object
  OthelloPlayer
      StupidComputerOthelloPlayer

public class StupidComputerOthelloPlayer
extends OthelloPlayer

A StupidComputerPlayer object represents a computer player who selects a move by randomly chosing from the allowed locations.
